SELECT t.storefront_id storefrontId, t.id orderSplitId, t.address_id addressId, t.house_id houseId, t.number orderSplitNumber, t1.storefront_name storefrontName FROM dj_deliver_order_split t INNER JOIN dj_deliver_order_split_item t3 ON t3.order_split_id = t.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront t1 ON t.storefront_id = t1.id INNER JOIN dj_deliver_split_deliver t2 ON t3.split_deliver_id = t2.id WHERE t3.receive > IFNULL(t3.return_count,0) AND t2.shipping_state IN (2, 4, 5, 7, 8) AND t3.is_reservation_deliver = '1' AND t.house_id = #{houseId} and t3.data_status = '0' and EXISTS(select 1 from dj_basics_product_template t4,dj_basics_goods t5,dj_basics_storefront_product t6 where t3.product_id=t6.id and t6.prod_template_id=t4.id and t4.goods_id=t5.id and t5.sales='0')
AND (t3.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%') or t.number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%'))
GROUP BY t.storefront_id, t.id, t.address_id, t.house_id, t.number, t1.storefront_name

SELECT t.storefront_id storefrontId, t.id orderSplitId, t.address_id addressId, t.house_id houseId, t.number orderSplitNumber, t1.storefront_name storefrontName FROM dj_deliver_order_split t INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront t1 ON t.storefront_id = t1.id WHERE t.id = #{orderSplitId} limit 1
